verses.text: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;

crossRefs.note: In the beginning was the Word
Handle me, and see

verses.text: (For the life was manifested, and we have seen it, and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)

crossRefs.note: In him was life
This is the true God, and eternal life

verses.text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

crossRefs.note: Fellowship of the believers
Called unto the fellowship of his Son

verses.text: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.

crossRefs.note: That your joy might be full

verses.text: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.

crossRefs.note: I am the light of the world
Father of lights

verses.text: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:

crossRefs.note: Men loved darkness rather than light

verses.text: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

crossRefs.note: Walk as children of light
Washed us from our sins in his blood

verses.text: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.

crossRefs.note: All have sinned

verses.text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

crossRefs.note: Confess and forsake shall have mercy
Thou wilt cast all their sins into the depths

verses.text: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.

crossRefs.note: There is none righteous, no, not one

verses.text: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

crossRefs.note: Another Comforter (advocate)
He ever liveth to make intercession

verses.text: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.

crossRefs.note: Propitiation through faith in his blood
Sent his Son to be the propitiation

verses.text: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.

crossRefs.note: If ye love me, keep my commandments

verses.text: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.

crossRefs.note: Profess they know God; in works deny him

verses.text: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

crossRefs.note: If a man love me, he will keep my words

verses.text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

crossRefs.note: Christ left us an example

verses.text: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.

crossRefs.note: Love thy neighbour as thyself

verses.text: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.

crossRefs.note: A new commandment… love one another

verses.text: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.

crossRefs.note: Walk while ye have the light

verses.text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.

crossRefs.note: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour

verses.text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.

crossRefs.note: Way of the wicked is as darkness

verses.text: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.

crossRefs.note: Remission of sins through his name

verses.text: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.

crossRefs.note: Stand against the wiles of the devil

verses.text: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.

crossRefs.note: Thy word have I hid in mine heart

verses.text: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.

crossRefs.note: Friendship of the world is enmity with God

verses.text: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.

crossRefs.note: Saw that the tree was good… pleasant to the eyes

verses.text: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

crossRefs.note: Fashion of this world passeth away

verses.text: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.

crossRefs.note: Man of sin revealed
False Christs and false prophets

verses.text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.

crossRefs.note: Many of his disciples went back
There must be heresies… that they which are approved may be made manifest

verses.text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.

crossRefs.note: Spirit will guide you into all truth

verses.text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.

crossRefs.note: If ye believe not that I am he

verses.text: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: (but) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.

crossRefs.note: He that honoureth not the Son

verses.text: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.

crossRefs.note: If my words abide in you

verses.text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.

crossRefs.note: In hope of eternal life, which God promised

verses.text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.

crossRefs.note: Many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many

verses.text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.

crossRefs.note: They shall teach no more every man his neighbour
The Comforter shall teach you all things

verses.text: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

crossRefs.note: When he shall appear, we shall be like him
Blameless in the day of our Lord

verses.text: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.

crossRefs.note: Born again… of God
Whosoever believeth… is born of God

verses.text: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

crossRefs.note: Sons of God by receiving Christ
World hates you

verses.text: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

crossRefs.note: Change our vile body
See face to face

verses.text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.

crossRefs.note: Perfecting holiness
Be ye holy

verses.text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.

crossRefs.note: Law worketh wrath
By the law is knowledge of sin

verses.text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.

crossRefs.note: Lamb of God taketh away sin
Knew no sin

verses.text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.

crossRefs.note: Sin shall not have dominion
Abide in me

verses.text: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.

crossRefs.note: By their fruits
Show faith by works

verses.text: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

crossRefs.note: Bruise the serpent's head
Destroy him that had the power of death

verses.text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.

crossRefs.note: Born of God sinneth not
New creature

verses.text: In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.

crossRefs.note: Ye are of your father the devil

verses.text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.

crossRefs.note: A new commandment—love one another

verses.text: Not as Cain, who was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother's righteous.

crossRefs.note: Cain slew Abel
Abel's righteous offering

verses.text: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.

crossRefs.note: World hated me before it hated you

verses.text: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.

crossRefs.note: Passed from death unto life

verses.text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.

crossRefs.note: Anger and murder

verses.text: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.

crossRefs.note: Good shepherd lays down his life
Gave himself for us

verses.text: But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?

crossRefs.note: Open thine hand wide

verses.text: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.

crossRefs.note: Faith without works is dead

verses.text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.

crossRefs.note: Everyone that is of the truth hears my voice

verses.text: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.

crossRefs.note: Thou knowest my downsitting

verses.text: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.

crossRefs.note: Draw near with full assurance

verses.text: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

crossRefs.note: Ask what ye will
Ask according to his will

verses.text: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.

crossRefs.note: This is the work… believe
Love one another

verses.text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.

crossRefs.note: We will come unto him and make our abode
Spirit beareth witness

verses.text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

crossRefs.note: Beware of false prophets
Prove all things

verses.text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:

crossRefs.note: Word was made flesh

verses.text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.

crossRefs.note: Many deceivers deny Christ come in the flesh

verses.text: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

crossRefs.note: Be of good cheer; I have overcome

verses.text: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.

crossRefs.note: Ye are not of the world

verses.text: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

crossRefs.note: He that is of God heareth God's words

verses.text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

crossRefs.note: By this shall all men know

verses.text: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

crossRefs.note: Abounding in lovingkindness

verses.text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

crossRefs.note: God so loved the world

verses.text: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

crossRefs.note: While we were yet sinners
Propitiation for our sins

verses.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

crossRefs.note: Be followers of God; walk in love

verses.text: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.

crossRefs.note: No man hath seen God at any time

verses.text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

crossRefs.note: If any man have not the Spirit

verses.text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.

crossRefs.note: This is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world

verses.text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

crossRefs.note: Confess with thy mouth

verses.text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

crossRefs.note: Rooted and grounded in love

verses.text: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

crossRefs.note: Come boldly unto the throne

verses.text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

crossRefs.note: Spirit of bondage again to fear

verses.text: We love him, because he first loved us.

crossRefs.note: Great love wherewith he loved us

verses.text: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?

crossRefs.note: Love one another

verses.text: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.

crossRefs.note: Two great commandments

verses.text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.

crossRefs.note: Born of God
Love God, love brother

verses.text: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.

crossRefs.note: If ye love me, keep my commandments

verses.text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.

crossRefs.note: Commandment not hidden nor far off

verses.text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.

crossRefs.note: I have overcome the world

verses.text: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?

crossRefs.note: Confess Jesus is the Son of God

verses.text: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.

crossRefs.note: Blood and water from his side
Spirit of truth

verses.text: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.

crossRefs.note: Baptizing in the name of the Father, Son, Holy Ghost

verses.text: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.

crossRefs.note: Eternal Spirit; blood of Christ

verses.text: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.

crossRefs.note: The Father himself hath borne witness

verses.text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.

crossRefs.note: Spirit beareth witness with our spirit

verses.text: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

crossRefs.note: Life in himself

verses.text: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

crossRefs.note: He that hath the Son hath life

verses.text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.

crossRefs.note: Written that ye might believe

verses.text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:

crossRefs.note: Receive because we keep his commandments

verses.text: And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.

crossRefs.note: Believe ye receive

verses.text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.

crossRefs.note: Presumptuous sin
Ananias and Sapphira

verses.text: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.

crossRefs.note: Whatsoever is not of faith is sin

verses.text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.

crossRefs.note: Born of God sinneth not
Keep them from the evil

verses.text: And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.

crossRefs.note: Present evil world

verses.text: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.

crossRefs.note: Opened their understanding
That eternal life

verses.text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.

crossRefs.note: Flee from idolatry
